This 60 minute video is a relaxing and inspiring visual voyage through some of the most scenic regions of Europe. Countries featured include France, Italy, Sweden, England, Spain, and Greece. This video includes a beautiful instrumental soundtrack. Run time is 60 minutes.

programme.title: Crackling Fireplace - Part I
programme.desc: Enjoy a the sights and sounds of a glowing fire for 5 hours in Parts 1 and 2 of Crackling Fireplace - Available in 4k resolution.

programme.title: Elon Musk: Revenge of the Geeks
programme.desc: Visionary entrepreneur, Elon Musk achieved the impossible with SpaceX and Tesla, but Elon’s success made people question his “real intentions”. A look inside his childhood reveals why Elon lived in fear as a child, and why he never talks about his father...

programme.title: Alicia Kozakiewicz: Friend or Predator?
programme.desc: At just 13 years old, Alicia Kozakiewicz stepped outside her family home and into every parent’s worst nightmare. She’d agreed to meet the “friend” with whom she’d been chatting online for six months, but by the time she realized this man was a deranged predator, it was too late. How did she manage to stay alive? And what traumatic lesson does Alicia want all parents and teens to hear?

programme.title: Craig Scott: A Nation's Wound
programme.desc: In this bone-chilling retelling of one of the deadliest school shootings in history, Columbine survivor Craig Scott reveals the secret left by his sister who died that day.

programme.title: Katelyn Ohashi: For The Perfect 10
programme.desc: Top USA gymnast Katelyn Ohashi was the best gymnast in the world, until she became the target of relentless body shaming from her coach and social media. The elite gymnastics industry is notorious for body shaming, and when coach Valorie Kondos took over at UCLA, Katelyn rebelled against the stereotypes and her revenge went viral.

programme.title: Brian Bushway: Blind Sports
programme.desc: Record breaking mountain biker Brian Bushway became totally blind at the age of 14. He went from being an active teen outdoors to depression and uncertainty. He never thought he would be able to ride his bike again, until he developed a superpower that allowed him to see.

programme.title: Surviving A Serial Killer
programme.desc: S1:E2 Lisa McVey did not want to live past 17 years old, and on the day she wrote her goodbye letter, was snatched in the street. For the next 26 hours, it was up to Lisa to outsmart her captor, later identified as serial killer Bobby Joe Long.

programme.title: Chanel Miller: Write Your Own Story
programme.desc: As the press called her Emily Doe & his legal team tried to frame her assailant Brock Turner as the "star athletes with everything to lose," Chanel Miller remained anonymous. What pushed her to break her silence during the final days of Turners trial? And how did her powerful statement about her sexual assault give a voice to survivors around the world?

programme.title: Gloria Allred: The Fight For Change
programme.desc: One of the most loved and controversial lawyers in the world, Gloria Allred is responsible for putting Harvey Weinstein behind bars… and now, she’s going after Prince Andrew and Ghislaine Maxwell. Why does she get involved in these high profile cases and why is it all so personal for her?

programme.title: Bre Lasley: Uninvited Guest
programme.desc: Bre & Kayli Lasley called 911 four times as they fought for their lives against an ex-con who broke into their home, but the police never arrived. How did Bre survive this terrifying home invasion? And what happened to her younger sister, Kayli?

programme.title: Linda Cliatt-Wayman: A Teacher Like No Other
programme.desc: Linda Cliatt-Wayman volunteered to be Principal of one of the most dangerous schools in America. On her first day, she quickly realized that the job was much more complex and frightening than she thought. But, she was determined to give her students hope, even when they were threatening her life.

programme.title: From Thief to Self-Made Millionaire
programme.desc: Watch John Assarafs personal story of growth, the lessons he learned early on in life, and how he went from robber to self-made millionaire by brushing his teeth.

programme.title: 10x Your Life
programme.desc: Author, entrepreneur, and sales savant, Grant Cardone, breaks down the power of his 10X Rule and how you can use it to multiply your success.

programme.title: Blue or Red pill?
programme.desc: Mindvalley founder Vishen Lakhiani shares the secret to success and teaches a confused student how to make the right decisions in life. The choice is yours: Will you take the blue pill or the red pill?

programme.title: Rock Thomas - Rock Bottom
programme.desc: Rock Thomas delivers a powerful, personal story on how to resist the labels forced on you in order to redefine yourself

programme.title: Integrity or Nothing
programme.desc: This is how the worlds biggest music manager, Scooter Braun, climbed out of his rock-bottom to make it to the top. What started as sweat, tears and hustle blossomed into a life of generosity and compassion, all because of one important piece of wisdom from his father.

programme.title: Find Your Talent
programme.desc: Tom Bilyeu, co-founder of Quest Nutrition and co-founder & CEO of Impact Theory, reveals how this shift in mindset helped him find his passion.

programme.title: From Thief to Self-Made Millionaire
programme.desc: Watch John Assarafs personal story of growth, the lessons he learned early on in life, and how he went from robber to self-made millionaire by brushing his teeth.

programme.title: Real Stories With Charity Witt
programme.desc: The Inspiring story of how Charity Witt - The Worlds Strongest Barbie - won The Titan Games Season 1. Just as when she thought she was losing, and her competitor had a good lead on her, Charitys winner mindset kept her pushing to become the winner of Titan Games Season 1. Filmed at Strict Vision Athletics in Gilbert, AZ.

programme.title: Deshauna Barber: The Life-changing Question
programme.desc: Miss USA 2016 Deshauna Barber explains in this powerful speech how she was suddenly approached by a Target customer who changed her life forever...

programme.title: Sarah Prout: Toxic Love
programme.desc: Relationship advice inspired by the story of Sarah Prout and the 10 years of abuse she suffered. In this video Sarah Pout raises awareness about domestic violence, whether its emotional abuse, physical abuse, or both. She was brave enough to leave her abusive, toxic relationship, and that courageous decision changed her life for the better. We hope her courage inspires you, and remember you are stronger than you think!

programme.title: Life Lesson from a Deaf Comedian
programme.desc: Kathy Buckley the “Deaf comedian”, jokes her way to sharing her perspective on life, self-love and forgiveness

programme.title: The Ultimate Sacrifice
programme.desc: Navy SEAL David Rutherfords tragic tale of a fallen comrade shows you how to live the "Team Life".

programme.title: Real Stories: Frank Shamrock
programme.desc: UFC legend Frank Shamrock has a backstory you probably wouldn’t expect from one of the toughest fighters alive... As a kid, Frank Shamrock was the farthest thing from being a UFC legend—he was a criminal. He was put into Juvenile Detention Centers for all sorts of crimes. He wanted a way to escape the scary, torturously abusive home he grew up in, where his stepfather would make him do things that broke him physically and emotionally. But his tough, painful, and wildly unpredictable journey to becoming a UFC legend shows us success isn’t something that happens instantly, it’s a slow gradual process that’s reserved for those who don’t give up when things get hard.

programme.title: A Christmas Choice
programme.desc: ‘‘In business, what you don’t get done today can be done tomorrow. But with family, what doesn’t get done today is gone forever.‘’ - Rory Vaden

programme.title: Employer's Worst Nightmare
programme.desc: A toxic employee bullies her coworker and competes to win a new project. Will it be the rude, Harvard-educated "star" employee? Or her colleague whos just trying to do her best?

programme.title: Make These 7 Investments & NEVER WORK AGAIN
programme.desc: These investments can not only make you money, but they can allow you to never worry about money again!

programme.title: How A Janitor Made $8 Million SECRETLY
programme.desc: What does it take to become a multi-millionaire? Do you need a doctor salary? Do you need rich and famous parents? Do you need a fancy degree? Well sure these things can help, but you dont need these things to become a millionaire. In fact this episode will show you how a janitor living off of a janitor salary retired a multi-millionaire.

programme.title: "Bonds and Annuities, Social Security and Retirement Spending"
programme.desc: "Where bonds and annuities fit in your investment portfolio, collecting Social Security vs. living off of your retirement savings, and paying student loan debt vs. saving for the future, today on Your Money, Your Wealth podcast 508."

programme.title: "When to Pay Off Your Home, Retire, and Do Roth Conversions"
programme.desc: "Deciding whether to be debt-free, controlling your taxes, and choosing when to retire are all part of the retirement plan spitballing, today on Your Money, Your Wealth podcast."

programme.title: How Venture Capital Works & Blackstone vs Blackrock
programme.desc: Venture capital is a two hundred- and fifty-billion-dollar industry that takes your money whether you know it or not and puts it into promising start-ups like, FTX, Theranos, and WeWork but what do these people actually do all day and how are they different from private equity or hedge funds? Venture capital is a type of private equity and private equity is any investment made into a non-public company or security. A private equity fund raises money from investors to buy companies or other assets that are not listed on public exchanges and use them to generate returns. Private companies are much less transparent then public companies which are forced by the SEC and the exchanges to publish financials every quarter in addition to other information that they must keep current. Private companies are also harder to buy or sell since you can’t just open your Robinhood app and buy some shares. The difficulty and illiquidity of dealing with private companies means that investors expect higher returns and the managers running the funds can charge higher fees to compensate them for the extra work. They achieve those high returns through a number of different strategies, one strategy is a buyout fund that will take investor money, take out a large loan on top of that money and use it to buy a large established company that can be made more efficient by laying off staff and improving processes. Another private equity strategy is the rescue fund that buys a failing business for cheap and tries to turn it around, usually by laying off staff and improving processes. But if you don’t have the stomach for firing people all day then Venture Capital is the type of private equity for you. Most of the private equity industry works with established private companies but venture capital invest into businesses that are just getting started. Some private equity investments will be made into businesses that are nothing more than some ideas drawn on a napkin. But what does that actually involve doing? You wake up one day and find out you

programme.title: Most People Alive Today Will Work Until They Die
programme.desc: "Most people alive today will work until they die. Retirement is the career professionals promised land. Study hard at school, get a good job, work hard your entire life, live within your means, invest diligently and you will be rewarded with endless free time in your final years. Its not much to ask for, but to most people alive today it will only ever be a dream. So its time to learn How Money Works to find out why you will be working until you die."

One For The Road
programme.desc: Join the Teton Gravity Research crew as they dissect and explain lines from One For The Road, TGR's 2011 snowsports film.

programme.title: Ice Edge
programme.desc: Ice Edge is a short documentary about a group of surfers trying to make surfboards out of ice. It follows the process from freezing the boards, shaping them and taking them out into the sea. There is a lot of trying and failing. Will it work at all? The boards are slippery, and they melt very fast. Everything needs to work simultaneously: The surfers must be ready. The boards cannot crack. The perfect wave must come. Ice Edge is a film where nature and people play together.

programme.title: Sea Kayaking in Gaspésie, Québec
programme.desc: A massive and rugged peninsula surrounded by the Gulf of the St. Lawrence, Gaspésie features a dramatic coastline where beautiful wilderness rivers meet the ocean. Join host, Ken Whiting, as he sea kayaks around the iconic Percé Rock and stand up paddleboards the Bonaventure River.

programme.title: The Dream Factory
programme.desc: Join TGR's all-star athlete team as they travel the globe in search of deep snow, steep lines, and gnarly cliffs and couloirs on which to push the limits of skiing and snowboarding.

programme.title: Kayaking Québec City
programme.desc: Join host, Ken Whiting, as he sea kayaks along the Jacques Cartier River before heading to Québec City to explore the cobblestone streets and old buildings the UNESCO World Heritage Site is known for.

programme.title: Brown Pow Day
programme.desc: Head to British Columbia with TGR and Anthill Films as crew and riders alike attempt to envision the biker's equivalent of a powder day while filming for unReal, TGR's 2015 bike film.

programme.title: Utah
programme.desc: Tag along as Teton Gravity Research takes a huge crew into the light and fluffy snow of Utah and is blessed with some of the best early season conditions that Utah has to offer. The whole crew works hard to throw down their best tricks for the film.

programme.title: Inside the Film Accomplice
programme.desc: Join the world's most talented mountain bikers on a whirlwind tour around the globe and get a glimpse behind the scenes of Teton Gravity Research's 2020 MTB film ACCOMPLICE, with a focus on characters and technology.

programme.title: Ski BASE
programme.desc: Join the Teton Gravity Research crew for a close look at the thrilling and dangerous world of ski BASE-jumping, which some consider the pinnacle of adrenaline sports.

programme.title: Italia
programme.desc: Join Micah Black, Meg Oster, Jeremy Nobis and Erik Roner as they head to Italy. After Micah, Meg, and Jeremy enjoy some fresh powder in Cinque Torri, they meet up with skier and BASE jumper Erik Roner, who proceeds to blow minds.

programme.title: MotoAmerica: SC-Project Twins Cup
programme.desc: Twins Cup Race 2 brought the heat on Sunday! Dive into the best moments from another wild ride through one of the most unpredictable MotoAmerica classes.

programme.title: The 900 Series
programme.desc: Brant services a faulty door handle; Tony joins Dustin at Fabspeed to make modifications on a 992

programme.title: Sams Garage
programme.desc: Completion of the control arms and brackets on Kevins Jeep. The HEM Saw Thunderbird gets a new front bumper. Sam installs a Holley EFI on his 49 Chevy truck.

programme.title: Bike World
programme.desc: Chris has spent the last few weeks re-connecting with the new Honda CBR600RR on road and track, it got right under his skin, so is it time to squeeze back into those leathers?

programme.title: BP Ultimate Rally Raid
programme.desc: The BP Ultimate Rally-Raid will be part of the W2RC in 2024.The competition, on the portuguese and spanish tracks, promises unforgettable moments for cars and motorbikes.

programme.title: Formula 2 Interseries
programme.desc: Open to cars built between 1967 and the end of the 1978 season, this grid recreates the magical era when F2 was the proving ground for young drivers intent on making the step into Grand Prix racing

programme.title: Daytona 200
programme.desc: Experience the full adrenaline-pumping action of the 83rd Daytona 200 held at the legendary Daytona International Speedway on March 8, 2025. This year's race was marked by intense competition, strategic battles, and high-speed drama that kept fans on the edge of their seats.

programme.title: It's Sew Easy
programme.desc: Sewing experts offer easy ways to create neat sewing projects right at home. Viewers of all skill levels learn tips and techniques for creating professional-looking garments, personalized apparel and home accents. Weekly episodes feature various themes, and feature two main projects and one shorter technique segment. Some projects include monogramming napkins and towels; baby poncho, hooded towel and baby-friendly diapers; embellishing yoga pants with a clothing tattoo; and sewing on knits.

programme.title: Mechanical Man (1932)
programme.desc: Oswald has to save his girlfriend from a mad scientist who wants to use her heart to bring his mechanical man to life.

programme.title: World of Water
programme.desc: A disgruntled refugee scientist, frustrated in both his professional and personal lives, develops a universal solvent, which threatens to turn all solid material into water.

programme.title: EARLY GRAVE
programme.desc: After ten years apart, six people are summoned to the isolated island estate of one of their former friends, now a famous horror writer. Once there, separated by guilt, yet bound together by a terrible secret, seven fractured adults try to reconnect with each other, and take stock of their lives.Outside, the storm clouds gather. Rain, lightning and wind isolate the house by washing out the road and knocking down the power lines. The group is stranded at the estate, and unable to get off the island. Then, they begin to be brutally murdered one by one.Someone is out there in the wind and the rain, someone who has waited ten years to wreak a bloody vengeance on this group. Seven friends find themselves in a struggle to survive and outwit a diabolical killer who is savagely committed to sending them all to an EARLY GRAVE.

programme.title: NIGHT ZERO
programme.desc: Six couples struggle for survival after a massive catastrophe occurs in Pittsburgh.

programme.title: CLUB HABANA
programme.desc: Barbara is about to travel to Spain for an exhibition of her paintings. The night before starting her journey there is a hurricane and she has to stay in a nightclub until the morning. During the night she comes into contact with different people who have a variety of conflicts and interests. She is drawn into this microcosm which seems to be a reflection of Cuban society today.

programme.title: HANGMAN
programme.desc: Two Iraq war vets Nick and Lenny return to the hometown of their ex girlfriends to see if they can rekindle the flames. What should be a little R&R in the woods slowly turns into Murder & Mayhem, when they take off with the girls to an abandoned cabin on their closed Alma Mater campus. There they fall prey to a deadly game of Hangman. This one comes complete with a real noose for the losers. Lust soon gives way to suspicion and fear as they turn on each other to survive. Only the Hangman knows who will win this game

programme.title: Naayagi Episode 46
programme.desc: Nayagi is a 2018 Indian Tamil-language Family Drama series. The show was produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S Kumaran. Nayagi was also re-aired on Kalaignar TV from 1 March 2021 and it ended its run on 9 July 2022 Plot Anandhi, a middle-class woman, struggles to keep her life together while dealing with an alcoholic father and his debts. programme.title: Untouchability in Ambedkar's life | Fight and revolution
programme.desc: Bhimrao Ramji Ambedkar (14 April 1891 6 December 1956) was an Indian jurist, economist, social reformer, and political leader who headed the committee drafting the Constitution of India from the Constituent Assembly debates and served as Law and Justice minister in the first cabinet of Jawaharlal Nehru, and inspired the Dalit Buddhist movement after renouncing Hinduism.

programme.title: Deivamagal Episode 6
programme.desc: Deivamagal is an Indian Tamil-language soap opera starring Vani Bhojan and Krishna. It was broadcast on Sun TV initially from Monday to Friday and later extended to Saturday at 8 PM from 25 March 2013 to 17 February 2018 for 1,466 episodes. The show replaced S. Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. This serial was shot in Pollachi, Chennai, Chengalpet, Hyderabad, Kerala, Puducherry, and Cuddalore. This is the first TV serial shot in the Bay of Bengal Plot Prakash his wife Sathyapriya and his eldest sister-in-law Gayathris conspiracies against their families to conquer Prakshs ancestral property Jai Hind Vilas.

programme.title: Meet The Women Staff - Madras Crocodile Bank Trust
programme.desc: The Madras Crocodile Bank Trust and Centre for Herpetology (MCBT) is a reptile zoo and herpetology research station, located 40 kilometers (25 mi) south of the city of Chennai, in the state of Tamil Nadu, India. The center is both a registered trust and a recognized zoo and comes under the purview of the Central Zoo Authority, Ministry of Environment and Forests, Government of India. It was established with the aim of saving three Indian endangered species of crocodilethe marsh or mugger crocodile, the saltwater crocodile, and the gharial, which at the time of the founding of the trust were all nearing extinction.

Whether youre a fan of heartwarming family dramas, thrilling mysteries, or gripping romance, we have something for everyone. We provide you with informative and entertaining videos that enhance your TV viewing experience. With Tele Vikatan, youll never miss a moment of the television magic.

programme.title: Gummys Sick Day
programme.desc: Gummy is feeling under the weather – and, as a finicky, fussbudget patient, soon winds up driving his pals Kala and Harry both sick... of him!

programme.title: Silly Cat
programme.desc: Cat does nothing but just watches tv and lazes on the sofa. And has messed up the tv room with spilled water and popcorn and all things upside down.

programme.title: Ghost Mansion
programme.desc: Keet and Cat’s chase ends up in a haunted house…with a crazy ghost living in it. The ghost loves Keet and wants to have her as a pet for himself.

programme.title: Spooktacular.
programme.desc: The gang is ‘haunted’ by a mystery spook – and sets out to overcome their collective fear and get to the bottom of the scary mystery.

programme.title: The Contest
programme.desc: Rich eccentric Grumpy McCrab launches a contest with a huge prize for whoever can go longest without laughing, smiling, singing or dancing. Miraculously, Gummy winds up among the finalists..

programme.title: Smighty Frighty
programme.desc: In this Halloween-themed story, Sneevil and Biggs get the scare of the lifetime when the Spooky Smighties decide to teach them a lesson in the middle of Fright Forest.

programme.title: I Gotta Go !
programme.desc: Rise and Shine Don- it’s a normal morning at the Doggy household…but wait.. whats the mice upto in the bathroom…Looks like there is no way Don can start his day normally ever!

programme.title: The Best Day Ever
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: THE LILY OF THE EAST:
programme.desc: The Guardians take a welcome break from brainteasers to go fetch pollen from the Lily of the East, which only grows in one faraway cave. Everyone (including Negu) is convinced the flower’s pollen bestows magical powers. After an arduous journey through a bamboo forest and a series of caves, the Guardians reach the lily. But Koto and Amkko (who have been following in disguise) snatch the flower! By distracting the two mutants with riddles, the Guardians regain the precious flower and its pollen, which the Elders wanted…to flavor their tea!

programme.title: RAIN IN KELIFORNIA
programme.desc: It is monsoon time and the teashop is leaking at various places. The customers are irritated with rain drops trickling on their head, clothes and even into their tea tumblers. And they start leaving the shop. A tensed Chai Raja orders Sundar to put a sheet over the roof. Sundar obediently and effectively does it and comes back. But Basha seizes the opportunity and wants to have some fun. It is leak marathon in the teashop with a group of suffering customers, angry Chai Raja and a panic stricken Sundar. At last when the entire roof flies off and it is literally monsoon inside the teashop, Basha stylishly comes outside the shop holding a giant umbrella. And all the customers run under it and have their steaming teas and snacks. An angry Chai Raja whacks Sundar and ask him to learn something from the smart Basha!

programme.title: LetGo
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: MONKEY KALARI
programme.desc: A Kalari Gurukkal does a demonstration outside the Chai shop and suddenly the hotel has a massive swell of customers jostling in. Chai Raja is thrilled at the sudden pile of customers as tea glasses and snacks fly off the counter and even the flies are shooed off their hangout for lack of space. The extra publicity is great and Chai Raja sends out a complimentary snack plate with Sundar to the Kalari Guru- Basha planning to swipe a few complimentary snacks himself follows Sundar but then stops short as he sees the high leaps and stunts of the Gurukkal suddenly Basha is extremely interested in learning the art. (Basha sees the kalari moves as a easy way to out-of reach snack shelves). He approaches the teacher, but the latter is a stern man and is not easily coaxed. Basha tries buttering up the Gurukkal- at first the lazy Sundar doesnt clue in but when he realizes that Basha plans to use the Kalari moves to chomp away the fries kept for the customers. Sundar decides (thought bubbles) to master the art himself and beat Basha before he can succeed. Now the Kalari Guru has two very-very interested/undesired disciples who are intent on learning- or not letting the other one learn- Kalari! Add to this the fact that Chai Raja is losing his cool thanks to Sundar neglecting the customers and his job for the sake of the lessons. Sundar has to dash off for a bit and Basha creates his own Kalari moves. Its no time for monkeying but will Sundar realize that before its too late?

programme.title: Wheres Nino?
programme.desc: Nino is trying to have a non-magic game time with Deedee, but she wants just the opposite. So she conjures a invisi-ball game. But the spell bounces off the ball and makes Nino invisible instead. Deedee is sad her spell went cuckoo on Nino, but Nino can’t stand her magic any more, so she checks out a remedy in her magic book and finds that the spell would cancel itself with three chimes of the town hall bell. Deedee decides to get Nino to the spot at the earliest. Nino scares the Doobydoos in his new ‘form’, but soon gets them to play along as he removes his helmet and is completely invisible now. Nino loves the fact that he is invisible and plays tricks on sleepy Charlie. Deedee sees the Doobydoos playing with the helmet and think they are throwing Nino about. But when she realizes that Nino isn’t in it, she is even more worried as the spell can become permanent if it isn’t cancelled soon. Nino has lots of fun playing pranks on Tiggy, Deedee, Charlie and Mewmew. Nino soon realizes that his pranks have gone out of hand that Mayor De Pfeffle announces over the loudspeaker to get Nino to come to them. Nino appears and is stubborn to stay invisible, so Deedee catches Nino with her hat and gets him in place to take full effect of the town hall chimes. Having regained his visibility, Nino agrees that a little magic is fun.

programme.title: Space-whale
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: KUSHTI ME MASTI
programme.desc: It is a regular morning in hotel Kelifornia until the much feared wrestler comes in for food. Sundar is all set to please him. But things go for a toss when the wrestlers arch-rival comes in and expects to be served by Sundar. A hapless Sundar is torn between the two angry fat men. And to add to the misery is our super mischievous Basha who is making sure that Sundar messes up everything with the wrestlers. The chain of events reach a point where the wrestlers start a kushti fight inside the hotel and BashamakES sure that Sundar becomes their punching bag. Will Sundars luck save him?!!!

programme.title: Cock a Doodle Doo
programme.desc: Keet has a visiting friend from the city -the cocky Rooster. He is a Black Belt Karate champion.

programme.title: KING SCUMWORM
programme.desc: Peng’s carelessness leads to the Ninjas fighting their way out of the nest of a huge (but dopey) parasitic monarch.

programme.title: SPACE INVADER
programme.desc: Krackleflint is back with the latest and greatest diabolical offering from Krackleflint Industries Inc.

programme.title: The Tortoise and the Hare
programme.desc: The Hare, the fastest animal in the woods, and the tortoise, the slowest, compete in a race.

programme.title: A Book for a Book
programme.desc: Cat is sick of Keet winning all the time. He runs through the newspapers and sees an ad of a book ”10 ways to catch a parrot”.

programme.title: Pizza Mania
programme.desc: Dunky has made pizza and gives one slice to each of them. Cat likes the pizza so much that he do not want to share the balance pizza with Keet.

programme.title: Down With Flu
programme.desc: Don is down with flu and his sneezes have left the mice sleepless. They take it as their sole responsibility to stop Don’s sneezes by hook or crook! From medicinal ginger tea to ringing up the doctor they try it all to stop the flu.

programme.title: BADminton
programme.desc: Marco & Polo are playing badminton in the backyard like a sweet family. Then the shuttle cock falls on Cats head as he is about to catch Keet.

programme.title: Office Fiasco
programme.desc: Don gets a new office job and he is so excited to begin. Are the rats equally excited?? well they are – but for something else. With their pranks and tricks, Larry Marly and Charly make sure that Don doesnt reach his office. But, when he somehow reaches the office, they make sure that the boss throws him out finally.

programme.title: The Tin Soldier
programme.desc: The brass soldier, GoGo who entered the playroom where the toys lived has no leg. A soldier who feels homogeneity with a ballerina who always stands with one leg up. But the soldier is caught up in a clown trap and falls out of the window.

programme.title: Holiday Resort
programme.desc: Don and colonel are about to start their wonderful holiday in an elite resort. Instead, they don’t even spend a single peaceful second in the place. Thanks to the mad rats! At last when the dogs leave the resort, they plan a nasty trap for the rats. But the rats are too smarttt…..

programme.title: Sundar Bana Hulk
programme.desc: A customer who is a doctor comes to the caf carrying a box filled with test tubes. He accidentally leaves a test tube behind by which Sundar happens to drink it. Sundar now starts having episodes where he turns into a muscular, scary version of himself for a brief while (like Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde). He bullies Chair Raja and Basha during these episodes but then the potion starts to wear off. Sundar continues to fake it but finally has to bear the brunt of his bullying.

programme.title: Show Time
programme.desc: We start the show with a close up of the remote the camera pulls out to see Keet picking the remote and starts watching the last episode of “ Bigger boss” a reality show on TV.

programme.title: BORROWED GLOVE
programme.desc: When Xia finds he’s surprisingly bad at archery, he borrows the Glove of the North and becomes a great archer. Negu sends The Archer, a mutant, to challenge Xia to a contest. The stakes? The Glove of the North!

programme.title: Friends or Foes
programme.desc: Its friendship day and Dunky makes both Keet and Cat share friendship bands with each other and makes them promise to maintain friendship for a day at least.

programme.title: The Wet Cat
programme.desc: Cat is chasing Keet in the mud and gets dirty, GrandPA is in the garden watering the plants he points the hose pipe to Cat and gets him wet and tells Dunky to give him a long due bath. Much to Keets amusement.

programme.title: Cricket Match
programme.desc: Keet and Cat decides to play a game of cricket in the backyard with their own set of teams.

programme.title: The Organizer
programme.desc: Gummy and Harry team up to become “super-organized’ – and their non-stop efficiency winds up being more than a little ‘too much of a good thing”.

programme.title: Space Ride
programme.desc: Don and Colonel stare at the moon maps and rockets. And along with Charly Marly and Lary, their rocket leaps out from earth and into outerspace. Meteors flash past and they land on a new planet, will they ever make it back to earth again???

programme.title: Gummy’s Sick Day
programme.desc: Gummy is feeling under the weather – and, as a finicky, fussbudget patient, soon winds up driving his pals Kala and Harry both sick... of him!

programme.title: Disapprearing Act
programme.desc: In the waking world, Odessa gets embarrassed, which makes her invisible in the Zooniverse. With the humorous help of the Zoonicorns she gains understanding and perspective – and becomes visible again! When you make the effort to understand your feelings, you can manage them and move forward from them in a positive way.

programme.title: Mystic Stick Gone Wild
programme.desc: When Pai complains that his stick is just like any other ordinary stick, Negu sends a horde of fake sticks, fans and swords to the Guardians. The weapons come to life and rebel against their supposed masters. April, Xia and especially Pai have to learn to connect with their own weapons to defeat the fake ones.

programme.title: Neighbour Watch
programme.desc: There is a beautiful new girl in the neighbourhood. Everyone from the rat trio to Don to Colonel to King Chomp is bewitched by her. Now the place is all about wooing and flirting and fighting for the pretty betty. But there is a naughty twist in the story when a new guys lands. Who is it???

programme.title: Rewind Wand
programme.desc: Nino and Deedee are out for a stroll and hear a familiar snore. Seeing postman Charlie taking a nap, they make a pillow with stones for Charlie to help him nap better. Just then Mewmew bumps into them with a jammed roller skate stuck to his leg. Deedee wants to help but she doesn’t have her magic wand, so rushes off home to get it. En route Tiggy needs help with his whisk that isn’t working and he needs to finish whisking a large batch of cupcakes. This makes Deedee rush along faster. On the way she sees the Doobydoos stuck up a rock crying out for help. She really needs her wand to help everyone, but she cannot even find the wand in her home. Nino and Deedee run out to trace their steps back along with the twins and Charlie’s hammock. Nino and Deedee use the hammock as a safety net to get the Doobydoos down from the rock. With all the Doobydoos, he helps Tiggy by presenting him with an army of whiskers. Having the work all done, Deedee takes a bowl of lemon icing to pour into Mewmew’s rollerblade shoes, and it easily comes loose. All of the rescued and helped friends of Deedee muster up to find her magic wand. Charlie sleepily walks in scratching his back, complaining of something poking him all the time during his nap, which turned out to be Deedee’s wand! Everyone’s in for a treat of freshly baked cupcakes. It certainly turned out to be an exciting non-magic day but with the magical power of friendship

programme.title: Dragonfish Lake
programme.desc: The twins are out skateboarding and delivering newspapers to homes around Abra-Dabra, but Uncle Charlie warns them it can be dangerous as it might hit someone. But thinking of the possibility of the idea, Charlie tries a hand at throwing a newspaper onto Tiggy’s lawn, but ends up flying in through the window. On hearing a scream, Charlie rushes in apologising for hitting Tiggy, but it turned out that Tiggy was moaning for what he read in the newspaper. It was about a contest of the Chef Challenge Award featuring whether Tiggy’s rival, Chef Alfonse could win it. Tiggy always wanted to win the challenge but never knew what original recipe to make. Tiggy gets jealous as he reads Chef Alfonse’s fish-a-la mode recipe that he promises to create the dish himself and if turns out to be really good as the newspaper says it is, he will admit how good his rival really is. So Tiggy waits a long while at the lake to catch a fresh fish as the recipe calls for it. Soon all his friends come over to help him fish, each with their very own fish lines. Seems a little magical assistance can help this time. But the lake is now occupied by one big playful dragon fish. The dragon fish turns out to be really hungry, so Tiggy sets out to make the biggest beetroot and berry snack ever. The dragonfish gulps it all down happily, but Deedee is sad she couldn’t really help Tiggy with the recipe. Tiggy on the other hand is quite ecstatic that he was able to whip up the most original dish ever. So over pancakes the next day Tiggy discovers that he has been awarded the annual Chef Challenge Award for the most original beetroot and berry recipe based on the photo and information Deedee gave to the judges. Tiggy is delighted to see an appreciative comment by Chef Alfonse that Tiggy’s surprise-a-la dragonfish being totally top-notch.

programme.title: Ski Trip Fun!
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are on a vacation, skiing in Shimla. You think the trio would leave them alone?? Hell no!! Romance blossoms in the snow and the rats make sure that Don and Colonel turn against each other. And they have a great time watching them fight.

programme.title: BOLT-ADE
programme.desc: Peelville is plagued by a lightning-charged beverage that is the latest weapon in the arsenal of an intergalactic megalomaniac.

programme.title: The Lost Lagoon
programme.desc: After spilling juice on mom’s blanket and not fessing up, Odessa feels guilty. In the Zooniverse, she offers to lead her friends to a lagoon to watch a butterfly dance but doesnt speak up when she loses the map. Never give up, try your hardest, and always tell the truth!

programme.title: An Eerie Hustle
programme.desc: Don finally gets to play tit for tat with the mice and they are running for their lives. Don’s house turns into haunted house and the ghost of Don is hungry for some dead meat preferably dead mice meat.

programme.title: Rocking Chair
programme.desc: GrandPAs chair has broken and wants Dunky to make a new one. Dunky agrees to make it for him and gets into action in the verandah.

programme.title: SOMETHING STINKS
programme.desc: Negu has his henchmen pump a foul green fog up to the Yan World, forcing the Elders to evacuate the Westerly Breeze. Aboard the Lord of the Wind, Pai fails to impress the Elders and gets “Rocky Rodent” – a crisis of confidence. The Elders have to pump Pai’s confidence back up so he can help Xia and April defeat the Worm Monster sent by Negu.

programme.title: Flash Blind
programme.desc: Don rips apart the parcel and out comes A Brand New Camera! Don is on a clicking spree. He makes colonel pose and ends up clicking Ballu. From friends to enemies to the innards of his tummy, he captures it all.

programme.title: Better Than You
programme.desc: Pancake must come to terms with not being better at something than his little sister Maple, which is mirrored in the Zooniverse when he tries to help the Zoonicorns build Jiggly Stone wall. Even when you’re not the best at something, you can always be helpful.

programme.title: Plot for Teacher
programme.desc: Speed and his friends have succeeded in acquiring the missing part from the Shadow Organization, but upon trying to make it work with the Mach 6, they are thrust into an alternate reality where the Shadowy Organization is in charge. They must return the part to where they found it, in Shadowy Org HQ, in order to get back to the present. Now that theyve had a glimpse of the Shadowy org.s master plan, they know what they have to do to stop them.

programme.title: Atchoo!
programme.desc: The Guardians meet a very cute mutant with a terrible cold. They decide to adopt it and name it Atchoo. When the Guardians see that the gates of the Magic Fort standing open, they think Atchoo has betrayed them. But in fact, Atchoo has been captured by Amkko and Koto, who wanted to get Negu’s defective mutant back again. The Guardians free their friend and discover that the only ones at the Magic Fort were the Wise Elders, doing a spot of cleaning.

programme.title: Day At The Spa
programme.desc: Don and Colonel want to pamper themselves. Yes!! a complete spa treatment. And when Larry Marly and Charly enter the scene, spa becomes a punishment for Don and Colonel. But when they are at their wits end, the dogs make sure that, the naughty rats learn a lesson. How does the twist happen??

programme.title: Dunky Doll
programme.desc: Hoodie the crow is really upset with Dunky as he is so loyal that GrandPAs house & is the only house were he cannot steal anything.

programme.title: Shy Tommy Prickles
programme.desc: Mewmew is all set for her party but didn’t have sufficient time to handout the invitations. Deedee and Nino agree to help. They soon invite all of Abra-Dabra, but Tommy Prickles isn’t so keen on attending, because he feels so very shy. But as Deedee doesn’t have any spell to make Tommy’s shyness go away she improvises without magic by making Tommy believe that she has cast a spell on Tommy’s hat. Tommy agrees to attend the party in the guise that the hat he is wearing is now a chatter hat that will help him talk to others at the party. Nino is confused as he’s happy on one side that magic wasn’t used but sad that Tommy thinks magic is used. Tommy Prickles fits right in at the party and has fun playing with the Doobydoos and talks so freely and happily with everyone. Just then a huge gust of wind ruffles everything including Tommy’s hat. Poor sad Tommy feels so shy and helpless that he wants to go back home. But Deedee implores him to stay by trying to make him hopeful that Nino would return soon with Tommy’s hat. Tommy slumps on the ground and won’t budge, not until Deedee gets Tommy to don Tiggy’s baker hat. Tommy jumps springs back up and rounds all the party goers to teach them his very own special Wiggly Worm dance. Just then as they all dance in a bee-line behind Tommy, Nino flies in with Tommy’s hat. A confused Tommy discovers that he was wearing Tiggy’s hat till then and is flabbergasted to know that Deedee didn’t work any magic into the hat all along. Tommy Prickles runs away crying. Tommy reasons with Deedee that all of Abra-Dabra will think of him as silly, but Deedee tells him that if he couldn’t believe her, then to at least believe those who love having him along. Tommy looks up to see all his friends walking up to him doing the Wiggly Worm dance. Tommy takes a brave step and listens to his friends wanting have him back. He joins them just the way he is, without his ‘magic’ hat. Deedee finally agrees with Nino that sometimes no magic is good.

programme.title: BABY POX
programme.desc: Everyone but Pai catches a pox that makes you act like a baby. He has to sail the Lord of the Wind by himself to get a mushroom for the cure, all while caring for the “babies.” Negu sends a huge Mutant Toad. Luckily, the toad catches the Baby Pox, too!

programme.title: River of Time
programme.desc: An impatient Pancake must wait a WHOLE DAY to bake a cake with Mama but learns different methods of patience in the Zooniverse, where time keeps slowing down. How to manage waiting and delays with a bit of patience and optimism

programme.title: Squirrel Scare
programme.desc: Fred can’t believe that Brains is afraid of anything, let alone little tiny squirrels. Every year their town is overrun with hundreds of migrating squirrels! Together they struggle to rid the town of squirrels.

programme.title: Gummy’s Sick Day
programme.desc: Gummy is feeling under the weather – and, as a finicky, fussbudget patient, soon winds up driving his pals Kala and Harry both sick... of him!

programme.title: Shapeshifter
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: It's OK To Make Mistakes
programme.desc: Dada and Bubbles make a delicious dish together. Soon, Duda shows up and wants to decorate it with ketchup, but ends up pouring it all over Bubble. Meanwhile, Caber is busy organizing his books at home. Duda comes and offers to help, but only causes more mess. Later, Duda sees an apple and tries to pick it for Bubble; Unfortunately, he loses his balance and falls into a paint that splatters all over Pinkar. Poor Duda is having a very bad day. With the help of Scots Time Machine, Duda decides to travel back in time and fix his "mistakes." Will Duda be able to undo his mistakes? Or will he discover something quite surprising?

programme.title: Smightycorns
programme.desc: Melody and the magical Smightycorns perform at a festival, while the Villains try to ruin the day by disguising themselves as one. When Sneevil and Biggs get their hands on the Air Stone, a winding chase ensues through the Magic Region.

programme.title: A Cold Crunch
programme.desc: It is freezing cold. Don is wrapped in a blanket when he notices a glow from the mouse’s hole. Wearing sunglasses and shorts, They have an orange coil burning right in the centre and its toasty and warm in there. Don has found a solution, he picks up the phone and orders for an electric blanket!

programme.title: Rewind Wand
programme.desc: Nino and Deedee are out for a stroll and hear a familiar snore. Seeing postman Charlie taking a nap, they make a pillow with stones for Charlie to help him nap better. Just then Mewmew bumps into them with a jammed roller skate stuck to his leg. Deedee wants to help but she doesn’t have her magic wand, so rushes off home to get it. En route Tiggy needs help with his whisk that isn’t working and he needs to finish whisking a large batch of cupcakes. This makes Deedee rush along faster. On the way she sees the Doobydoos stuck up a rock crying out for help. She really needs her wand to help everyone, but she cannot even find the wand in her home. Nino and Deedee run out to trace their steps back along with the twins and Charlie’s hammock. Nino and Deedee use the hammock as a safety net to get the Doobydoos down from the rock. With all the Doobydoos, he helps Tiggy by presenting him with an army of whiskers. Having the work all done, Deedee takes a bowl of lemon icing to pour into Mewmew’s rollerblade shoes, and it easily comes loose. All of the rescued and helped friends of Deedee muster up to find her magic wand. Charlie sleepily walks in scratching his back, complaining of something poking him all the time during his nap, which turned out to be Deedee’s wand! Everyone’s in for a treat of freshly baked cupcakes. It certainly turned out to be an exciting non-magic day but with the magical power of friendship

programme.title: The Fastest Porter in the Land
programme.desc: Aladdins in big trouble when he forgets to deliver the egg traders eggs to market. Luckily Jamillah brings him a bike. After teaching him how to ride, they head off to deliver the eggs only for them to break them along the way. They eventually have to ask Genie to help by conjuring some eggs. After a few failed attempts it seems he manages it but we discover Genies magic eggs have a surprise inside that delights the customers.

programme.title: Flower Power
programme.desc: Zap doubts that Leila is tough enough, but she proves you dont mess with her when Sneevil vacuums up Smightyland and the Smighties.

programme.title: Treeto-Man
programme.desc: Treeto secretly wishes to be a superhero. He tells Duda his dream, but says he could never be a hero in real life. Duda disagrees, and wants to help him become one. Duda creates several intentional "emergency" situations that require Treetos help. Unfortunately, someone else beats him to it every time and ruins Dudas plans. Duda tries one last time to make Treeto the hero. However, the false emergency becomes a real one. Although everyone tries hard to prevent a terrible accident, in the end it is Treeto who saves the day. Surprisingly, the friends discover that Treeto has been the real hero behind the scenes all along.

programme.title: The Speed record
programme.desc: MewMew has a new stopwatch and wants to time everything that everyone does, to get to them to do it at record speed. Life in Abra-Dabra becomes intolerable as everyone tries to be quicker than the next person. Eventually Deedee and the others persuade MewMew to break all his speed records. When he achieves it no one applauds him, so MewMew realises that many things are better done in their own sweet time. He also realises that by doing everything fast, he is missing out on enjoying many things.

programme.title: The Violinist
programme.desc: Gummy finds an old violin and, on discovering that he’s a distant descendant famous musician of “Gummy Stradi-bear-ius”, he starts playing the violin non-stop... driving everyone around him completely nuts.

programme.title: The Jokester
programme.desc: Zaps silly pranks on his friends go too far and he finds himself all alone to fight Sneevil. A hilarious dance off between Zap and Biggs will determine who will get control of the Smighty Stones.

programme.title: Golden Eggs
programme.desc: Hoodie has his eyes on the hens eggs in GrandPAs farm. Keet has saved them once but is sure Hoodie will try again.

programme.title: The Wrestler
programme.desc: Cat notices that Katreena is a big fan of “macho man” a well built super star .He needs to build his physique and impress her.

programme.title: BIG BUNNY
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to prepare a big feast. Pai sees this as his chance to impress the Elders and earn a new weapon to replace his Mystic Stick. But when he goes to collect the rare striped carrot (a crucial ingredient for his dish), he’s attacked by a Giant Bunny Mutant sent by Negu. His Mystic Stick helps him defeat the Mutant, so he’s content with his weapon…for now.

programme.title: A Mail Carrier for a day
programme.desc: Pelly, the postman, hurt his leg landing. Duda offers to help him deliver the rest of his mail. Before leaving, Pelly makes him promise to deliver a particular important letter and gives him specific instructions. Soon, Duda meets Dada and she helps him deliver the mail to Pinkar. When Duda sees everyone getting excited about his letters and packages, he starts to feel neglected and left out. The sun is setting, but Duda has one last letter to deliver, the important one. Surprisingly, Pellys instructions lead him to his house. Duda opens the letter to find an invitation to a party at the lake. But its not just any party. Its a very special party... just for Duda.

programme.title: Even More Difficult – The Beauty & The Best
programme.desc: SANDRA and FO travel into the tale of Beauty and the Beast, having been called out by BEAUTY. The BEAST has mysteriously disappeared, just when she had come to love him. The Detective and her assistant must find him before the magic rose in the garden loses its last petal.

programme.title: Weather Boy
programme.desc: Rain keeps Fred and his buddies stuck inside, until Friday secretly clears the rain clouds, earning Fred the name, “Weather boy.” Brains warns Fred never to try that again, though Nora begs him to make her beach party have a sunny day. Fred’s tinkering attracts a strange gas cloud, which they must freeze, causing snow on the beach.

programme.title: Irse para quedarse
programme.desc: Ulyana es testigo de una conversación que no era para sus oídos. Ella logra salvarse, pero pierde la memoria

programme.title: Pasado pero no olvidado
programme.desc: Liuba conoce a un hombre encantador. Él resulta ser el nuevo director de la planta y ya no es tan amable.

programme.title: Instinto paterno
programme.desc: La esposa embarazada de Andréi sufre un accidente, los médicos logran salvar a su bebé, pero la madre muere.

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: SuperDad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Popeye's 20th Anniversary 1954
programme.desc: Popeye is being honored for his 20 years of films, in a dinner hosted by 'Bob Hope' (several other celebrities are present, like 'Jimmy Durante', Bing Crosby, 'Jerry Lewis' and 'Dean Martin'). When called on to make a speech, he instead shows clips from two of his movies. Bluto does a slow burn through this, finally stuffing Popeye's trophy onto Popeye's head - but the trophy is full of spinach, so Popeye clobbers Bluto.

programme.title: Spooking About Africa 1957
programme.desc: Casper is in an African jungle. He frightens a zebra at a watering hole. Wheezy the elephant has a terrible sneezing problem; he sneezes all the feathers off a peacock and a group of monkeys out of their perches. Casper decides to help, and in the process dislodges the feather that was making the elephant sneeze. But then a fire breaks out, and the elephant is unable to sneeze on command.

programme.title: April Maze-1930
programme.desc: Felix the Cat and his two nephews try to have a picnic, but a thunderstorm and a thieving rabbit prevent them.

programme.title: Rookie Revue 1941
programme.desc: The toons do a send up of the military as only the toons can do

programme.title: Rocket Bye Baby 1956
programme.desc: A cosmic mix-up results in a Martian baby being delivered to Earth, while an Earth baby is sent to Mars. Joseph Wilbur and his wife try to raise the green-skinned, ingenious Martian tyke as if he were an Earthling. But the kid builds his own spaceship and flies away, and Wilbur must find him and bring him back, or he'll never be able to make an exchange with the Martian parents for his own boy.

programme.title: Patriotic Popeye 1957
programme.desc: Popeye is enjoying watering his patriotic garden on July 4 when he catches his nephews attempting to light fireworks. The game is on when he attempts to confiscate the fireworks and the boys strike back with edgy pranks. Bluto and Olive Oyl do not appear in this cartoon.

programme.title: Pest Pupil 1957
programme.desc: Baby Huey, the over-sized duck, is enrolled in kindergarten but his size and clumsy attempts to fit in causes such havoc that he is expelled by the teacher. His mother then hires a private tutor, who is led a life of misery due to Huey's efforts to do good that unintentionally backfire. But the tutor winds up in the ocean---unless Huey lived on a shark-infested lake---and and is about to become a shark meal but Huey saves his life...and gets his diploma as a reward from the grateful tutor.

programme.title: Now Hear This 1962
programme.desc: In this very abstract cartoon, a hard-of-hearing old Britisher finds a red horn and uses it as a megaphone, unaware that it is really a lost horn from the Devil's forehead. The Britisher finds that the horn has the effect of amplifying every sound psychedelically and causing him serious bodily harm

programme.title: Norman Normal 1968
programme.desc: After a multicolored rock group introduces the cartoon, Norman Normal is asked by a boss to wine and dine a client at a nightclub party, something Normal is uncomfortable with. He talks with his dad about it who rambles on and tells Norman, "don't make waves". At the party, Norman talks with his lampshade-clad friend Leo, disapproves of a joke told by one of the guests suspecting it's about a "minority group" and is ridiculed by the bartender for only having a ginger ale. Norman leaves the party and returns us to the multicolored rock group.

programme.title: The Playful Polar Bears-1938
programme.desc: A joyfully contented group of polar bears encounter danger when hunters arrive.

programme.title: Taxi Turvy 1945
programme.desc: On the outside of an office building, Popeye and Bluto duke it out as rival window washers.

programme.title: Gumbasia 1955
programme.desc: Clay objects of all sizes, shapes and colors contort and reshape themselves to a jazz music score.

programme.title: Superman: Billion Dollar Limited-1950
programme.desc: Superman battles train robbers seeking to steal a billion dollars worth of gold.

programme.title: Big Bad Sindbad 1952
programme.desc: Popeye tells his nephews about the time he walloped Sinbad, the *second* greatest sailor who ever lived

programme.title: Cad and Caddy- 1947
programme.desc: Lulu plans her revenge against a distressed golfer who refuses to give her a lollipop after he promised her one for caddieing for him

programme.title: Tokyo Woes-1945
programme.desc: When Tokyo Rose begins spewing her anti-American propaganda over the airwaves, Seaman Hook is inspired to fight back, using War Bonds as literal weapons against her.

programme.title: The Booze Hangs High-1930
programme.desc: Bosko has a grand time on the farm, dancing with a cow, playing a horse's tail like a violin and getting drunk with three pigs

programme.title: The Mechanical Monsters 1941
programme.desc: Superman battles a criminal mastermind and his robot army.

programme.title: Barnacle Bill 1930
programme.desc: Sailor Bimbo (as Barnacle Bill) jumps ship with his little black book and visits his lady friend, Betty Boop (with dog's ears).

programme.title: Boom Boom-1936
programme.desc: World War I, apparently. There is a series of quick blackout gags, including a soldier that throws the pin, is blown sky-high by the grenade, and is caught in a net by an ambulance driver; one soldier's encounters with very smart bullets; a machine gunner with the jitters. Porky leads a charge, but with no support from his company, he runs back and dives under Beans' bunk. After a quick chorus of "You're in the Army Now," a messenger pigeon drops in with news that General Hardtack is being held prisoner. They dash off in a motorcycle/sidecar, chased by another smart bullet, and arrive in the nick of time to dispatch the general's captors. They fly off in a plane and get shot down to end up together in the hospital.

programme.title: Gripes-1943
programme.desc: Private Snafu learns the hard way about the need for military dicipline and procedures to maintain an effective army.

programme.title: A Spanish Twist 1932
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry (the human versions, not the cat and mouse) are on a raft in the ocean. After being attacked by an octopus and losing their raft, they wash up on the shores of Spain. After harassing the waitresses at a local sidewalk café, they insult the owner and wind up in a bull ring as punishment. In the midst of fighting dozens of bulls, they receive a telegram that Prohibition has been repealed back in the U.S. They immediately leave Spain headed back to the U.S. for a drink

programme.title: Betty Boop's Museum
programme.desc: Koko takes Betty to the museum, where she's locked in overnight and forced to sing at the skeletons' dance

programme.title: Superman: The Magnetic Telescope- 1942
programme.desc: When police interfere with a reckless scientist's experiment, it creates a deadly meteor shower only Superman can stop.

programme.title: The Arctic Giant- 1942
programme.desc: Superman versus a thawed-out Tyrannosaurus.

programme.title: Gopher Spinach 1954
programme.desc: Popeye battles a gopher over his precious spinach plants.

programme.title: The Inspector General 1949
programme.desc: A town's corrupt officials think a fool is actually an investigator in disguise.

programme.title: Balloonatic 1923
programme.desc: A hapless amusement park attendant finds his run away balloon ride has left him in a strange predicament

programme.title: The Amazing Adventure-1936
programme.desc: A bored millionaire wagers his doctor that he can support himself at a working class job for year without touching his inheritance.

programme.title: The Greeks Had a Word for Them-1932
programme.desc: In this sophisticated comedy Jazz Age comedy, a trio of money-hungry women all have sugar daddies who keep them in the lap of luxury, even as they drive the men crazy. Each woman represents a different personality type, from sensitive, to kind-hearted, to difficult and untrustworthy. The twenties come roaring back with immorality and in-fighting

programme.title: Smart Alecks-1942
programme.desc: Danny comes into money for capturing an elusive criminal - money which Mugs insists he split equally with the gang while gangsters want to split open Danny.

programme.title: See what happened in the world of sports while you were sleeping!
The latest sports that you may have missed!
You are watching the latest sports news from around the world!
Game previews, highlights and interviews from your favorite sport!
The Big Cat- 1949
programme.desc: 1933. A city boy arrives in his late mother's birthplace to discover the locals have been pestered by drought, old fights and a cougar. He turns out to be pivotal in all of these

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show: S1E11: Dead Men's Hills
programme.desc: Roy, Dale and Pat give a hand to an injured sheriff battling a gang headed by notorious outlaw Les Hannom, near the desert town of Dead Man's Hills.

programme.title: The Wackiest Wagon Train in the West 1976
programme.desc: Four episodes of Dusty's Trail edited together into a movie. The episodes, in the order shown, are: "Tomahawk Territory", "Horse of Another Color", "There is Nothing Like a Dame", and "The Not So Magnificent Seven".

programme.title: The Lone Ranger: S1E12: Return of the Convict
programme.desc: The Lone Ranger becomes concerned when he hears a recently released prisoner, John Ames is returning to his home town threatening to take revenge on those who wrongly accused him of robbing a stage. At the town news breaks that Ames' intended victims are dead. The Lone Ranger becomes embroiled in the mystery when he's accused of aiding Ames in the murders.
